Judul: SUPPLY CHAIN PERFORMANCE MEASUREMENT CASE STUDY: INDONESIAN PHARMACEUTICALS INDUSTRY
Abstrak: The Purpose of this study is to identify Supply Chain Management and performance measurement in BFM, benchmark with other Pharmaceutical companies and to create solutions in improving and developing Supply Chain Management in BFM using the Supply Chain Operations Reference model (SCOR). The methodology of supply chain research in BFM was surveyed by field observation, interviews, and research. Interviews were conducted to examine the main issues and a hypothesis was tested by applying SCOR model. This study found that problems arose in the Supply Chain Management of BFM, such as lead time issues, low performance, and a wide gap of performance in its industry. Practical implications give specific recommendations for planning such as information sharing, decision making, performance measurement and technology. Kata Kunci: Supply Chain Management, Performance Measurement, Indonesia Pharmaceutical Industry, SCOR
